website_summaries.verdict: Great mid-level option from one of the top antivirus companies in the industry.
pros: Provides a comprehensive level of protection that is easy to use for the average computer user
Great features focused on internet surfing and browser usage
A single subscription will cover a variety of desktops, laptops and smart devices
cons: Can be finicky when using with a Mac

customer_reviews.title: Don't be too quick to renew.
customer_reviews.text: I've been with Webroot for about 3-years and it's still as good as ever and light years better then Norton. I've reviewed prior versions before but the renew process for it is a breeze... just open your account, type in the new number and you're done. The only downside is your 365-days begins the day you renew and you lose whatever days you may have had left on the expiring version so if already have it and can put up up all those annoying popup reminders to renew wait until the last few days before you enter that new number.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!  This is NOT Webroot Internet Security!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! This is NOT what it seems! The listing or heading states "Webroot Antivirus Protection Internet Security | 3 Device | 1 Year Subscription | PC/Mac Disc", yet it is NOT Webroot Internet Security, it is Webroot Antivirus! I purchased this thinking it was Internet Security version. It seems to me to be false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Awful you can't remove it if you don't have a password ,support sends temporary passwords that don't work when your expiration date is near your computer slows down all they are interested in is your renewal. Emailed support with no answers I recommend do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: ojoprieto

customer_reviews.title: CD version
customer_reviews.text: Never needed tech support. I uninstalled the last one, then installed the new one. I've been using WEBROOT for several years now. Never understood why the CD (physical) version is cheaper than the (download) Renewal version. Same program, same features. For me, If you can wait to get the CD, you'll save money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy with slow internet
customer_reviews.text: I put this program, the basic version, on my PC and it slowed my computer down so much that windows explorer took 5-min to open. Microsoft Edge took 8-min FireFox took 6-min. While it is doing its check to see if the program is safe to open it locked up my home network until it was done checking. This might be great for fast internet, but slow internet subscribers like my self, 7Mbps download and 1Mbps upload, it is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: This is a great antivirus program which is fast and does not consume ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great antivirus program which is fast and does not consume resources as do other antivirus programs. However, there is one major caveat, Webroot can not be configured to automatically scan hard drive partitions. It only scans the partition where your OS is located, which is usually the C drive. If you are like me, I have my HD divided into many drive partitions. I have four partitions: C-F. You can manually scan each partition, but what a hassle. For a paid antivirus program, this is unacceptable IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: swampy11

customer_reviews.title: Go to your webroot account to re-enter your new serial code
customer_reviews.text: Installation wasn't as easy as the first one from 2016. Example: I purchased the 2017. After inserting the cd there should be a pop-up or window that open up but it did not, due to that it took me an extra 15 NY minutes to complete the set up. I clicked on the Webroot icon on my desktop, went to my account which I created last year and there's an option for "enter new serial code" (solved) The Webroot instructions says otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rezwan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Webroot Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my IMac. I have used Norton, McAfee, Kaspersky, and free antivirus software. These programs may be better suited for PC's but Webroot has worked best for me on the Mac. Is not intrusive and keeps my Mac clean. Does not have all the bells and whistles that other antivirus programs have, but you don't really need them with the Apple software. Furthermore, Webroot is less costly. It does not try to continuously try to sell you on upgrading to a "premium" version and does not interrupt with messages and bulletins. I have never needed to use any tech support so can't rate that feature. Basically, once installed it runs itself.
customer_reviews.author: Augie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product... Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using webroot virus protection for years... I usually buy the electronic version, where you are given a key code to enter into your already existing webroot console. I love that you can use it on three devises. I have never had webroot miss a virus and I really like that it checks for updates and installs them without interrupting what you are doing. It does the same on running scans. You will not be interrupted unless its important. I had to purchase and wait for the disk this year .. THATS NO BIG DEAL FOR THIS AWESOME PRODUCT THAT WILL PROTECT THREE OF YOUR DEVISES FOR A YEAR... all for $20.00 😁
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Died two months before the expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the online version in November of last year. It is suppose to be good through then and now it won't open. Online help (couldn't contact via phone) says to uninstall and reinstall. Problem is since buying it online I can't find the key code to do that. It is nowhere a year later on Amazon. Only alternative is to purchase again and loose two months of service. It is a Web based service so this really isn't nice of them. Update: I got it working and I have no idea how. Hopefully it continues until I can repurchase in two months as I have been using them for 4 years and it has worked great at stopping viruses.
customer_reviews.author: CDBear

customer_reviews.title: Reliable virus protection at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Found out through some research that it's cheaper to buy new on Amazon than renew this virus protection from within my already installed Webroot on my laptop. Pricing for the same product is half as much to buy it online than to renew through the already installed software. At any rate, it's still working great! I have used this brand for many years now without any issues! Very happy with its reliability for protecting the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Tozion

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The is my third year of using Webroot. It does not seem to slow down my ancient Win7 computer, which has not become infected. When it discovered a potential threat, Webroot found and quarantined it. Over the years I've used many different AV programs, and Webroot ranks well in comparison. I've used many "free" AV programs, only one of which did not use "nagware" to get me to buy the full version and that one is no longer "free." I bought the disk not the download version. I'd say if you want a good AV program and don't need things like ID protection, Webroot is fine.
customer_reviews.author: W Olson

customer_reviews.title: Easy install once you know how
customer_reviews.text: Have used Webroot for years. I do wish they gave more clear info on what each product offers and doesn't. The CD came in a folded cardboard from Webroot, and sealed on one side. It didn't come in the customary sealed plastic box where the license is hidden. Instead, the license number could be easily seen by slightly opening the bottom unsealed part of the folded cardboard. The instructions for install were incorrect. Finally, we decided to uninstall the current version. After that, the install was quick and easy. Webroot doesn't slow down the computer like some anti-virus does. Once you learn it, the program more or less just runs itself, which is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Ws not compatible with my Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this protection was not compatible with my chromebook even though I asked if it would be, so I had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jadine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better Off Without It
customer_reviews.text: Might be better off just using Windows' built in antivirus over this. The software has too many notifications for my tastes, and you'd be better off without it. If you want a more efficient AV, go get Kaspersky, or just use the default software and only go to websites you trust (also, always be careful browsing the internet). Stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to install and was referred to tech support for help. Was given the hard sell for 299.00 $ and I terminated my connection with them. I then downloaded a free antivirus from another company with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jack

customer_reviews.title: I could not download this software without the keycode. ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not download this software without the keycode. Inside the software package there is a space for the keycode, but no keycode was listed. This is very insulting to any paying customer. And to add further insult to injury, the customer service rep at Webroot, in a condescending tone of voice, told me that I need to contact Amazon, which I did. Amazon was at a loss at to how they can resolve my dilemma.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Non obtrusive anti-virus software that works well.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Antivirus software that was fairly priced and that does not use too much of my computers power. This program is non obtrusive and stays in the background. It flashes a reminder in the lower right corner of the screen upon start up that's its working and that is the last time you even know it's on your computer. I've had no virus issues and I'll likely buy this again in a year.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Support needs to be easier
customer_reviews.text: When i bought my last laptop I bought this for anti-virus. Much to my surprise the PC came with two years free anti virus. When it expired i opened the webroot box and tried to install it. They said the keycode "expired". Keycodes should not expire. It took two weeks and many e mails to finally get it to work. Even if i had used it right away,,, the support was not as good as it should be
customer_reviews.author: exconsul

customer_reviews.title: WANT TO WASTE A COUPLE DAYS WORK?  THEN BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: COMPUTER WAS FINE TILL I INSTALLED THIS. GOT A KBDCLASS.SYS WITH THE FAMOUS BLUE SCREEN. COULDN'T EVEN GET TO THE AREA UNINSTALL THIS "ANTIVIRUS SOFTWARE" SO, HAD TO BACK THE DATE ON THE COMPUTER AND LOSE A COUPLE DAYS OF WORK. NOPE. DON'T BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my laptop because I was having so much trouble playing words with friends on facebook. It turns out the problem was all the ads from facebook. I installed an ad blocker and that solved my problem. Anyway, the software seems to be working OK, but I didn't have any virus or malware so I don't know just how well it works if you need to remove a virus or malware.
customer_reviews.author: GBW

customer_reviews.title: I've used Webroot for 4-5 years
customer_reviews.text: I really like Webroot. Used it for 4-5 years, now. Amazon is the cheapest price that I could find.. But don't install it until you have used up all the time on your current subscription, otherwise you will lose those days.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Current version. Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a version at Wal-mart some time ago It was an older version. Couldn't return it. This version loaded up just fine. There needs to be better definition from Webroot as far as last year/ this year version What am I buying? 2018? please be sure.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Quick Review
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 6 weeks. I bought it from the link on amazon. The disk arrived quickly and installed quickly without problems. I didn't give it five stars because I would really need to see how well the computer is protected over 10 or 12 months. (That's the real test, right ?) My understanding it that it does not primarily download a massive # of "signatures" but up to date information "in the cloud" updated constantly. It is true that there seems to be no penalty in computer performance. August 23, 2016 It seems to work fine it has quietly "taken care of" bad stuff. My computer is not messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Grabbag

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this Webroot protection every year and have never had a virus attack my computer. It warns me of any suspicious sites I enter that can be unsafe. Great product and will continue to buy it each year.
customer_reviews.author: Moody Blues

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech Support
customer_reviews.text: I could not get program to load and run on Mac. I found a support number, on line, and then received great customer support. It did take a while for the tech to get the program going but seems to be up and running just fine. BTW, it did load and run ,on Windows, in about two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: CLIFF

customer_reviews.title: Blue Screen of Death when running on windows 10.
customer_reviews.text: Blue Screen of Death when running on windows 10. There appears to be a conflict with the keyboard drivers. When Webroot Antivirus was installed, you couldn't type more than a few keys before the system would crash. I had to use the onscreen keyboard ( from the accessibility settings ) to uninstall the software. Removing the software solved my issue. I would consider trying the software again if they can get this issue sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Markussen

customer_reviews.title: BEST APP EVER
customer_reviews.text: I STARTED USING WEBB WHEN I BOUGHT MY FIRST COMPUTER.... I HAVE NEVER HAD A VIRUSE... THE PRODUCT IS VERY EASY TO INSTALL.... I LIKE THAT YOU GET COVERAGE FOR 3 DEVICES. THE PRICE WAS FANTASTIC..... YOU CAN NOT GO WRONG WITH THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Webroot Antivirus is a winner
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year with Webroot having used Norton and Kaspersky prior. I like this program. Loads quickly, keeps out of the way and has (knock knock) kept my computers safe and virus free so far. Prior programs were a lot more intrusive and more difficult to keep running.
customer_reviews.author: Rob&Sue

customer_reviews.title: Auto Renews!! Controlling your account and charges impossible
customer_reviews.text: I think its a bit of a scam. Yes the product may work but they don't make it easy to control the auto renew or to view your charges. I lost the box so I can't find the 2 key codes. I only have the one but can't get the others in my account management. My auto renews in November but I can't seem to cancel it or negotiate. I think it will be around $100. I left msg to not auto renew but no answer. I'm not looking forward to trying to reverse the charges in November
customer_reviews.author: Harry Smithey

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Webroot for about 4 years now and have had no viral/trojan issues. It scans and does its thing without my noticing. I can play games, watch videos, etc. with no interruption. If there wasn't that little icon or an occasional question, I wouldn't even know it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Albs

customer_reviews.title: Great Program for my computer
customer_reviews.text: Been using this program for about 8 years now and have never had a single security breach or problem. All for about 20 dollars/year. Great value and easy to load. WEBROOT is great with awesome customer service! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: beaverstateguy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but....
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but beware you will lose any time left on the license you are updating. This loss cost them 1 star in my rating. Wait until you only have a day or two remaining on your active license before you activate.
customer_reviews.author: DMDinNCMn

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: I have Mac I tried several time to set up privacy and security and it does not work and it does not load on Mac . do not trust Amazon , saying it is Amazon choice . this is trash .
customer_reviews.author: Saeed Masjedi

customer_reviews.title: top rated by the experts I have had no problems
customer_reviews.text: i have been using Webroot for 3 years now without a problem. Easy set up, runs automatically and easy to manually run if I want to do an on the spot check.I have used other popular brands in the past but now feel Webroot works better. now 4 years
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Urban

customer_reviews.title: good protection
customer_reviews.text: i've used webroot for years .has always worked well for me ?
customer_reviews.author: MR.. A Black

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This antivirus protection was super easy and quick to install. Great price for coverage on three pc's. I've had no problems with it taking up space or slowing down my other programs....almost like it's not even there. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tashua Greenway

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't open in Catalina
customer_reviews.text: After installing on my iMac with Mac OS Catalina, a splash screen appears, but that's it. It did ask for my activation code before freezing, which it appeared to accept. Trying Sophos now, with better results (so far).
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Lyle

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and provides the protection I wanted at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald  D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Antivirus Program
customer_reviews.text: This program is definitely the best I have ever used. I've tried several others paid for or free and Webroot beats them all. Runs so smoothly and quietly in the background that you would forget it's there except for it briefly showing on your desktop at start. Other antivirus programs have slowed my system down, but not WebRoot. Try it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bouse

customer_reviews.title: Webroot internet security
customer_reviews.text: I always order Webroot Internet Security from Amazon and would never think of paying for it from a box store or renewing on-line directly to Webroot. Great Amazon product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: internet safety
customer_reviews.text: Does what others claim. Most viruses are transmitted over the internet. This program not only protects your computer online, but does so without ever needing human intervention after installation. What all protection should be modeled after.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: loading
customer_reviews.text: I tried to load it several times, and did not load.....my wife finally got it loaded on her and my computer
customer_reviews.author: Dennis V. Newberry

customer_reviews.title: worth the money but it blocks everything :)
customer_reviews.text: I like it BUT it goes overboard blocking everything in it's site. There have been times I've had to disable this just to allow something to go through, then enable. I do feel safe, but gets to be a pain sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Load and forget
customer_reviews.text: Best antivirus because it does all the work in the background. You never have to manually tell it to run scans. It does all that on its own. Perfect for the less computer literate who never would remember to manually run scans as the other name brand antivirus' expect the user to do.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hovde

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective protection with a few whistles and bells to boot.
customer_reviews.text: Third time I have used this software. The vendor tries to sell an update when it renews however I find it is always cheaper to buy a new copy and just delete the old. Nice that it supports up to 3 different computers for the price of the 1 disk.
customer_reviews.author: R. AUDETTE

customer_reviews.title: Been using Webroot for years
customer_reviews.text: A while ago I had a virus on my PC and this was the only program able to detect and remove it at the time. It scans quickly and doesn't cause my laptop to lag. I purchased the CD on Prime Day and it was as easy as just typing in the code that came with it to renew my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Got the product! It says invalid code when I tried to load it! Contacted customer/ technical service. Absolutely NO response! Terrible product, terrible company!
customer_reviews.author: ingo

customer_reviews.title: Webroot Antivirus 2017 | 3 Devices | 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had no issues using Webroot for antivirus and internet security. It has worked out for me and has definitely prevented my from going into malicious sites. I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tofu

customer_reviews.title: run !
customer_reviews.text: unfortunetly I loaded this program on both my laptop and desktop. It corrupted both computers so badly that I had to put them into the shop for repairs. because of the brands It was nessesary to put them into 2 different repair shops. both repair techs called and told me the security program was corrupt. we uninstalled it on both computers and they now run very well on just Microsoft defender. I attempted to return the software but was told by amazon I was 7 days over the limit. all I can say is beware of webroot programs.
customer_reviews.author: rodeo1

customer_reviews.title: Best Antiviral Program I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Webroot for about 5 years now and have never had a virus infect my computer. It's worked great for me - this year I put on all 3 of our computers as I found it to be the most effective antivirus program I could buy. It's also cloud based so it's always up to date.

customer_reviews.title: Thorough, simple to use and is good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good cost, very quick delivery, set-up is easy (no surprises) and seems to cover all of my needs. I really like this kind of boring. Thanks, guys!!

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to download to all 3 of my computers. Great price. All around good deal. Highly recommend this way to get your Webroot virus protection software.

customer_reviews.text: So much better than an AVG download I paid for thru Amazon. It was not a two year as advertised but turned out to be a free version that I paid 11.00 for. I’ll stick with Webroot also I’m no constantly annoyed by pop ups asking that I upgrade.

customer_reviews.text: bought disc was harder to get installed than before and still comes up asking to allowed to be entered every time the computer is re started!

customer_reviews.text: I like the product, and was able to use the key; but if ever I need the disk it is of no value. I opened and the disk is broken in 3 places.

customer_reviews.title: so i am hoping that is a good thing. scans are much faster than kaspersky

customer_reviews.title: In two years, no viruses.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for two years now and am very happy with its proactive approach to preventing me from going to questionable websites, even if they are "advertised" sites from news websites.

I've been using Webroot for 5 years or more and it's: (1) easy to install , (2) simple to use, (3) doesn't use a lot of resources and (4) doesn't bother my users unless they're trying to do something dangerous. I don't know if it's the BEST product out there, put it certainly seems to continue to work well in our environment.

Went to auto install and kept bringing up “renew” now screen. Plus it knocked off my one day saying I had no protection. After uninstalling original, install went smoothly.

Webroot took care of mess in about two weeks. I urge you to contact them for further assistance. It may also behoove you to join the membership discussion groups. Webroot also warns you if a website might be a threat to your machine.

customer_reviews.text: I had the free trial but didn't like the fact that to purchase it online it auto renewed. Buying the disc and then just using the key lets me control if I want to renew next year. That said, I like the protection provided and the fact that it is very light on resources.
customer_reviews.author: BHP940

customer_reviews.title: Nice Security Program
customer_reviews.text: Look this program. I like it better than the Kaspersky I had earlier. It seems, to me, to be more automatic. This is perhaps unfair, but it is American made, and I came to understand that some other security programs are Russian or otherwise foreign made. In that a lot of hacking comes from abroad, that made me seek out an American made security program.
customer_reviews.author: DOS

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I use webroot on my laptops. Several years ago I had issues with viruses. Since installing Webroot, i don't have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, Have been purchasing Webroot for many years, Have tried em all before, Norton, McAfee, Panda etc. None of them compare, webroot uses very little memory and it runs in the background trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good Anti Virus at a fair price. Buy the one year of protection!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Web-root Secure for many years. It has never had a problem, and from what I can tell it does not slow down my computer. If you shut down your computer at night make sure you run it manually as it is usually scheduled to run itself at 3 am. A CD costs about $20 for 3 computers for one year. I always buy the one year protection because I do not want to deal with this every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Received on time and it downloaded very easily following the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and it downloaded very easily following the instructions. I did take the advise of previous buyers and deleted all files on the previous product that it was replacing. Works well and quickly, compared to the product I was using. Have not had a chance to load it onto my tablet but I was showed by my daughter how well it worked on her tablet. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: William Tota

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Literally can't beat this Antivirus protection. Took me all of 60 seconds to install. It didn't affect the speed of my web browsing a single bit I would definitely recommend not to mention its only 20 bucks for the 2017 version and it allows you to install to 3 devices with one code.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Webroot internet secure anywhere
customer_reviews.text: If you have an old version you have to uninstall it before you can install the new version otherwise it will ask u to pay again and there is no provision to put in the key code
customer_reviews.author: Generalpanzertruppen

customer_reviews.title: Have to buy the software every year or be gouged on renewal
customer_reviews.text: Second year using this product for pc security. No known issues. Seems to do the job and price reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected the application to rid any viruses and/malware off my main laptop as I had previously borrowed a coworker's 2014 webroot version and it worked like a charm on secondary laptop. I purchased the 2015 version and it did not get rid of virus or malware. Waste of Money. ONly giving 2 stars as the 2014 version worked like a charm but the 2015 version didn't do anything.
customer_reviews.author: RJai7

customer_reviews.title: Uses less resources than norton or mc afee.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as advertised. Uses less resources than norton or mc afee.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Still a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wish that it was easier to install it doesn't install the way it states.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not catch virus on download but not sure of that
customer_reviews.text: Have this on all my computer s. Got virus on laptop that took over my profile but not guest profile, go figure right. Cleaned guest but not my profile, it's like my profile is junk now, got virus by letting someone download a child's book, lesson,!!! Don't let someone use your profile,
customer_reviews.author: A. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint & fast scans
customer_reviews.text: The updates do not come as frequently as the big names, but an excellent buy for everyday normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: This is not that good because certain malware cannot be removed by the software.
customer_reviews.author: michael mailey

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter on resources than others
customer_reviews.text: Light on system resources and does a fast scan. The only drawback is you cannot exclude any files or folders. So it's all or none.
customer_reviews.author: TommieT

customer_reviews.title: Webroot is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Considering protection, lack of intrusion on use, speed, and install/uninstall, Webroot is the best.
customer_reviews.author: SciTeach

customer_reviews.title: Really good software
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years, it works awesome, no viruses on my computer
customer_reviews.author: Charlie 11

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Webroot Internet Security for ten years and have never had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lamija Didic

customer_reviews.title: OK ANTI-VIRUS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING FOR YEARS AND HAVE HAD NO PROBLEMS WITH IT. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Did not download properly. Had to contact Tech support, he said the product was an older version. He took control of desktop fixed and downloaded correct version. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Just a waste of money. I had to take my laptop in to get it serviced because this software isn't good enough to find the newer stuff. Won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Burke

product_meta.title: Webroot Internet Security with Antivirus Protection Software | 3 Device | 1 Year Subscription | PC/Mac CD with Keycard
product_meta.description: Edition:PC/Mac Disc 1 Year SubscriptionThere's Always a New Cybersecurity Threat - Let Webroot Help. Nearly half of all consumers worldwide have been victims of cybercrime. Every link clicked, email opened, app downloaded, and network joined is an opportunity for hackers to compromise your personal data. Webroot offers complete protection from viruses and identity theft for all your devices - without slowing you down. Powerful, lightweight, and integrated protection for PC, Mac, and Android, Webroot Internet Security Complete with antivirus protects personal information by blocking the latest malware, phishing, and cyber-attacks. Fully cloud-based and faster than our competitors, we scan billions of apps, files, and websites continuously to determine where and what is safe online. This enables us to store malware definitions in the cloud and identify them in real-time, and provide an effective shield while maintaining a small footprint on your device. With more than 250,000 new malicious programs appearing each day, it is important to protect yourself along every step of your online routines, from shopping and banking to personal administration and social networking.
feature_bullets: PEACE OF MIND: No more worrying about when cybercriminals will breach your devices. At Webroot, we have the experience and the expertise to keep you and your family safe from today’s advanced attacks
COMPLETE PROTECTION: You are safe no matter when, where and how you connect. Webroot’s cloud-based technology detects and prevents online threats 24/7 and in real time
STOPS VIRUSES & MALWARE: Concerned about that new malware on the news? Webroot offers complete protection from the most up-to-date viruses and identity theft without slowing you down

SECURE BROWSING: Scans faster, uses fewer system resources, and protects you from phishing, ransomware and other malware in real time by instantly identifying and blocking threats before they reach your computer
HASSLE FREE: Experience automatic updates to the latest product versions and never worry about installing upgrades

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
